record.title: MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 7005, H.R. 7006, H.R. 7060
record.narrative:
MEASURES READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 7005, H.R. 7006, H.R. 7060 -- (Senate - December 08, 2008)

[Page: S10818]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that there are three bills at the desk. I ask for their first reading en bloc.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the bills by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 7005) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide alternative minimum tax relief for individuals for 2008.
A bill ( H.R. 7006) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide disaster assistance relief.

A bill ( H.R. 7060) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide incentives for energy production and conservation, to extend certain expiring provisions, to provide individual income tax relief, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I now ask for the second reading en bloc and object to my own request en bloc.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bills will be read for the second time on the next legislative day.
